item.title: GitHub in 2013: Pull Request Actors
item.description: An IPython notebook presenting a visual overview of GitHub repo pull request actors in 2013 based on data obtained from the GitHub Archive.

item.title: GitHub in 2013: Fork Events
item.description: An IPython notebook presenting a visual overview of GitHub fork request events in 2013 based on data obtained from the GitHub Archive.

item.title: GitHub in 2013: Follow Events
item.description: An IPython notebook presenting a brief visual overview of GitHub user follow events in 2013 based on data obtained from the GitHub Archive.

item.title: GitHub in 2013: Event Types and Commits
item.description: An IPython notebook presenting a brief visual overview of GitHub event types in 2013 based on data obtained from the GitHub Archive.

item.title: How Complex are TodoMVC Implementations
item.description: An article comparing 17 different JavaScript based implementations of a simple Todo list app using the code complexity metrics: lines of code, cyclomatic complexity, Halstead measures and Maintainability Index.
